programme.title: York Hall Nights
programme.desc: Uncut Butler v Sexton: A Box Academy event at York Hall in July 2012 featuring Paul Butler, Mitchell Smith, Joey Taylor and Charlie Hoy on a packed 7 fight card..(n)

programme.title: York Hall Nights
programme.desc: Uncut Pryce v Saunders: Billy Joe Saunders v Bradley Pryce for the Commonwealth Middleweight Championship was the main event on a 7 fight card that also featured Frank Buglioni and Stephen Smith..(n)

programme.title: BoxNation Presents
programme.desc: BoxNation Presents- Steve Collins defends his WBO title against Eric Seillier. Then, Chris Eubank takes on Carl Thompson for the WBA cruiserweight title- their second clash in three months..(n)

programme.title: David Price v Tony Thompson
programme.desc: The local crowd will be hyped in support for David Price the reigning British and Commonwealth Heavyweight Champion as he faces a tough opponent from the States, Tony Thompson..(n)

programme.title: Arreola v Stiverne
programme.desc: An exciting rematch for Chris Arreola and Bermane Stiverne who first fought a year ago, they now fight to claim the WBC World heavyweight title.(n)

programme.title: Welsh Dragons - Maccarinelli
programme.desc: Part 3. A tribute to some of the top fighters from Wales to have graced the ring..(n)

programme.title: Boxing Matters
programme.desc: Alex Steedman presents this show on BoxNation. Every time a big fight's coming up, Alex and guests will preview the action with exclusive interviews from the fighters. Why? Because Boxing Matters..(n)

programme.title: Black Cab Box Chat
programme.desc: Lewis Pettitt takes a spin round town in the world famous Hackney Cab.(n)

programme.title: BoxNation Presents
programme.desc: BoxNation Presents- Joe Calzaghe and Ricky Hatton topped the bill on 'Great Britons', defending their titles against two Americans. For Calzaghe it was Tocker Pudwill, for Hatton, Joe Hutchinson..(n)

programme.title: Boxing Tonight
programme.desc: Magazine show with Paul Dempsey and Richie Woodhall..(n)

programme.title: BoxNation Presents
programme.desc: BoxNation Presents- York Hall in Bethnal Green plays host to this 2002 WBO featherweight clash between Argentina's champion Julio Pablo Chacon, and the veteran Colombian Victor Polo..(n)

programme.title: Classic Fights
programme.desc: Marco Antonio Barrera vs Juan Manuel Marquez from 2007.(n)

programme.title: Ring Masters - Naseem Hamed
programme.desc: Jim Rosenthal and Richie Woodhall look back at the extraordinary ring craft of the former World Featherweight Champion Prince Naseem Hamed, in classic fights against Kevin Kelley and Wilfredo Vazquez..(n)

programme.title: BoxNation Presents
programme.desc: BoxNation Presents- Ricky Hatton was 28 fights undefeated going into his bout against Eamonn Magee. In front of 10,000 fans in Manchester, could he survive an early scare to retain his WBU crown?.(n)

programme.title: Heavyweight Special - Billy Walker
programme.desc: A profile of England's very own "Golden Boy" as we step back in time to a different era of Heavyweight boxing..(n)

programme.title: Classic Fights
programme.desc: Roy Jones Junior vs Glen Johnson from 2004.(n)

programme.title: Ring Masters - Joe Calzaghe
programme.desc: Jim Rosenthal and Richie Woodhall look back at the day when Joe Calzaghe announced himself at world level, by challenging boxing great, Chris Eubank, for the WBO Super-Middleweight title..(n)

programme.title: Boxing Tonight
programme.desc: Magazine show with Paul Dempsey and Richie Woodhall..(n)

programme.title: Ring Masters - Nigel Benn
programme.desc: Ring Masters takes a look back at the career of former WBC Super-Middleweight Champion Nigel Benn, one of boxing's most feared punchers of the 90s as he takes on fellow British fighter Henry Wharton..(n)

programme.title: BoxNation Presents
programme.desc: BoxNation Presents- Anthony Farnell is on home turf in Manchester, with his second crack at a world title. This one is against South Africa's Ruben Groenewald for the WBU middleweight belt..(n)

programme.title: Ring Masters - Frank Bruno
programme.desc: Jim Rosenthal and Richie Woodhall look back at the finest hour of one of Britain's most popular sportsmen of all time, Frank Bruno, when he made his 4th and final challenge for the Heavyweight title..(n)

programme.title: Classic Fights
programme.desc: Oscar De La Hoya vs Manny Pacquiao from 2008.(n)

programme.title: Ring Masters - Steve Collins
programme.desc: Jim Rosenthal and Richie Woodhall reflect on the career of tough Dublin Super Middleweight Steve Collins and his two epic World title encounters with the "Dark Destroyer" Nigel Benn..(n)

programme.title: Classic Fights
programme.desc: Oscar De La Hoya vs Shane Mosley from 2000.(n)

programme.title: Lee Selby v Patrick Okine
programme.desc: In front of a partisan Welsh crowd in Newport Lee Selby defends his Commonwealth Featherweight title against Patrick "The Mallet" Okine of Ghana..(n)

programme.title: Maccarinelli v Marosi
programme.desc: York Hall hosts former WBO World Champion Enzo Maccarinelli for his debut at Light Heaveyweight facing undefeated Hungarian Gyorgy Marosi - support provided by Tony Conquest v Toks Owoh..(n)

programme.title: Welsh Dragons - Calzaghe v Hopkins
programme.desc: The penultimate fight of Calzaghe's career sees him move up to light Heavyweight to take on ring legend Bernard Hopkins in Las Vegas..(n)

programme.title: Best of Bernard Hopkins
programme.desc: Uncut Hopkins v Shumenov: 49-year-old Bernard Hopkins took on Beibut Shumenov looking to become the oldest fighter in history to unify world championships in Washington. The whole night, uncut..(n)
